content.query:
CREATE MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY PASSWORD='BoobooBooboo!';

-- Create database scoped credential object with SAS for needed ADLS container 
CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL BlobCred 
WITH 
  IDENTITY = 'SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE',
  SECRET = 'sv=2021-04-10&st=2022-11-24T16%3A37%3A29Z&se=2022-12-02T16%3A37%3A00Z&sr=c&sp=rl&sig=HPlPUTTRLwBvaWnJT4umryarEr0p0lv0mzeVrtekOS0%3D';

-- Create external data source object for corresponding ADLS container and account
CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE BlueBadge
WITH 
  (LOCATION = 'abfss://bluebadgegen2fs@bluebadgegen22sa.dfs.core.windows.net',
  CREDENTIAL = BlobCred)

-- Create external file format object for Parquet data
CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT BBIParquet
WITH (
  FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET
  )

-- Create the external table
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE FlightDataExternal(
    [Year] INT,
    [Month] INT,
    DayofMonth INT,
    DayOfWeek INT,
    DepTime VARCHAR(8000),
    CRSDepTime VARCHAR(8000),
    ArrTime VARCHAR(8000),
    CRSArrTime VARCHAR(8000),
    NASDelay VARCHAR(8000),
    SecurityDelay VARCHAR(8000),
    LateAircraftDelay VARCHAR(8000),
    IsArrDelayed BIT,
    IsDepDelayed BIT,
    TaxiOut INT,
    Cancelled BIT,
    CancelledCode VARCHAR(8000),
    Diverted BIT,
    CarrierDelay VARCHAR(8000),
    WeatherDelay VARCHAR(8000),
    ArrDelay INT,
    DepDelay INT,
    Origin VARCHAR(8000),
    Destination VARCHAR(8000),
    Distance INT,
    TaxiIn INT,
    UniqueCarrier VARCHAR(8000),
    FlightNum VARCHAR(8000),
    TailNum VARCHAR(8000),
    ActualElapsedTime INT,
    CRSElapsedTime INT,
    AirTime INT
)
WITH (
  LOCATION = '/flightonefile',
  DATA_SOURCE = BlueBadge,
  FILE_FORMAT = BBIParquet
)

-- Query external table
SELECT Year, Month, COUNT(*) FROM FlightDataExternal GROUP BY Year, Month ORDER BY Year, Month

/* Create Internal table and drop auto-created CCI
SELECT 
    [Year], 
    [Month],
    DayofMonth,
    DayOfWeek,
    DepTime,
    CRSDepTime,
    ArrTime,
    CRSArrTime,
    NASDelay,
    SecurityDelay,
    LateAircraftDelay,
    TaxiOut,
    CancelledCode,
    CarrierDelay,
    WeatherDelay,
    ArrDelay,
    DepDelay,
    Origin,
    Destination,
    Distance,
    TaxiIn,
    UniqueCarrier,
    FlightNum,
    TailNum,
    ActualElapsedTime,
    CRSElapsedTime,
    AirTime
INTO FlightDataInternalCCI
FROM FlightDataExternal

DROP INDEX ClusteredIndex_<autogenerated suffix> ON FlightDataInternal
*/

-- Query internal table, with no index
SELECT Year, Month, COUNT(*) FROM FlightDataInternal GROUP BY Year, Month ORDER BY Year, Month

-- Query internal table, with unordered CCI
SELECT Year, Month, COUNT(*) FROM FlightDataInternalCCI GROUP BY Year, Month ORDER BY Year, Month 

-- Query internal table, with ordered CCI
--CREATE CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX FlightDataCCI ON FlightDataInternal ORDER (Year, Month) WITH (DROP_EXISTING = ON)
--SELECT Year, Month, COUNT(*) FROM FlightDataInternal GROUP BY Year, Month ORDER BY Year, Month
--DROP INDEX FlightDataCCI ON FlightDataInternal

-- Drop objects to clean up 

--DROP TABLE FlightDataInternal
--DROP TABLE FlightDataInternalCCI
DROP EXTERNAL TABLE FlightDataExternal
DROP EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT BBIParquet
DROP EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE BlueBadge
DROP DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL BlobCred
DROP MASTER KEY
